rationale: This table disaggregates revenue by detailed product/service lines such as Google Search & other, YouTube ads, Google Network, Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices, Google Cloud, and Other Bets, and includes a Total revenues row. It covers recent fiscal years (2022, 2023, 2024) and matches the preferred dimension inferred as product_service, providing a granular revenue breakdown consistent with the preference for product/service tables over segment-only tables.
